Text: Since I was 13 I already knew what I wanted to be when I grew up: A chef.
Speaker: None

Text: As I got older, I found that dream hard to achieve, but I never gave up.
Speaker: None

Text: After some years of dedication, I've got accepted at one of the most prestigious culinary institutes in Japan: The Blue Cordon.
Speaker: None

Text: This is the story of how that school changed me forever.
Speaker: None
